articles.title: Artificial nerve cells - almost like biological - Nanowerk
articles.description: Researchers have created an artificial organic neuron that closely mimics the characteristics of biological nerve cells. This artificial neuron can stimulate natural nerves, making it a promising technology for various medical treatments in the future.
